id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-educational-teen's educational needs supported by community care economy
title: Teen's educational needs supported by community care economy
description: Teen's educational needs supported by community care economy
content:
Scenario: Teen's educational needs supported by community care economy
    Given Jasmine needs school supplies, technology access, and learning resources
    And she has contributed to community care economy
    When educational needs arise
    Then community care tokens should be usable for educational resources
    And community_elohim should coordinate support for her educational success
    And her care contributions should connect to educational opportunity
    And barriers to education should be reduced through care economy networks
    And community investment in her education should reflect her community contribution
    And mutual care should extend to supporting each other's learning
